title: Improved Classification of Nitrogen Stress Severity in Plants Under Combined Stress Conditions Using Spatio-Temporal Deep Learning Framework
summary: This study proposes a novel deep learning framework for improved classification of nitrogen stress severity in plants under combined stress conditions, utilizing a Spatio-Temporal Deep Learning Framework.
usefulness_reason: Score 90 assigned because the title directly mentions "Spatio-Temporal Deep Learning Framework", which is highly relevant to the "Spatio Temporal" aspect of the query. The application to plant stress classification also implies a contextual dataset.
